creator: Youcat Foundation gGmbH
descriptionHtml:
YOUCAT already helped millions of people to grow in faith.

Awake your soul with the YOUCAT Daily app. The app offers a daily 5 minute dose of the most important texts of the Catholic church: Bible, YOUCAT and DOCAT.

BIBLE
* The basis of the YOUCAT Daily App is the Holy Scripture.
* Read the Gospel of the day proclaimed in Holy Masses around the world.
* Get inspired by a highlighted verse of the Bible.

According to the Gospel of the day a question and answer from YOUCAT or DOCAT is provided.

YOUCAT – Youth Catechism of the Catholic Church
* The most important contents of faith are summarized in a short and easy to understand question-answer style.
* YOUCAT was approved by the Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith in Rome and published officially by the Austrian Bishops' Conference.
* With over 5 million copies sold, YOUCAT is one of the best-selling Catholic books around the world.
* Recommended by Pope Benedict XVI.

DOCAT - Social teaching of the Catholic Church
* DOCAT is the social teaching of the Catholic Church presented in a simple and attractive way.
* The social teaching helps identify and counteract the major issues of our world. Major issues of our world are injustice, fear, hate, inequality, environmental pollution, unemployment, terror and violence. In other words, it shows you how you can change society through the power of the Gospel.
* Recommended by Pope Francis.

INSPIRATION
* Get inspired by motivating quotes of saints and testimonies from young people around the world.

CHALLENGE
* Take part in our Sunday challenge and put the Gospel into practice.

SOCIAL MEDIA
* Share your thoughts and moments with the YOUCAT Daily app on social media.
* Be encouraged by the initiatives of our community.
* See the latest posts on the integrated social media feed.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
* Your progress level is determined by the number of YOUCAT and DOCAT questions and answers you read along the way.
* Stay motivated by collecting badges and achieving streaks.


CONNECT WITH YOUCAT
* Contact with our support directly from the app.
* Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/youcat/
* Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/youcat
* Catch up on the latest with our newsletter: https://www.youcat.org
* Use YOUCAT Daily online: https://www.youcat.org/daily

Awake your soul with the YOUCAT Daily app. The app offers a daily 5 minute dose of the most important texts of the Catholic church: Bible, YOUCAT and DOCAT.

BIBLE
* The basis of the YOUCAT Daily App is the Holy Scripture.
* Read the Gospel of the day proclaimed in Holy Masses around the world.
* Get inspired by a highlighted verse of the Bible.

According to the Gospel of the day a question and answer from YOUCAT or DOCAT is provided.

YOUCAT – Youth Catechism of the Catholic Church
* The most important contents of faith are summarized in a short and easy to understand question-answer style.
* YOUCAT was approved by the Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith in Rome and published officially by the Austrian Bishops' Conference.
* With over 5 million copies sold, YOUCAT is one of the best-selling Catholic books around the world.
* Recommended by Pope Benedict XVI.

DOCAT - Social teaching of the Catholic Church
* DOCAT is the social teaching of the Catholic Church presented in a simple and attractive way.
* The social teaching helps identify and counteract the major issues of our world. Major issues of our world are injustice, fear, hate, inequality, environmental pollution, unemployment, terror and violence. In other words, it shows you how you can change society through the power of the Gospel.
* Recommended by Pope Francis.

INSPIRATION
* Get inspired by motivating quotes of saints and testimonies from young people around the world.

CHALLENGE
* Take part in our Sunday challenge and put the Gospel into practice.

SOCIAL MEDIA
* Share your thoughts and moments with the YOUCAT Daily app on social media.
* Be encouraged by the initiatives of our community.
* See the latest posts on the integrated social media feed.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
* Your progress level is determined by the number of YOUCAT and DOCAT questions and answers you read along the way.
* Stay motivated by collecting badges and achieving streaks.


CONNECT WITH YOUCAT
* Contact with our support directly from the app.
* Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/youcat/
* Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/youcat
* Catch up on the latest with our newsletter: https://www.youcat.org
* Use YOUCAT Daily online: https://www.youcat.org/daily

* Read the Gospel of the day proclaimed in Holy Masses around the world.
* Get inspired by a highlighted verse of the Bible.

According to the Gospel of the day a question and answer from YOUCAT or DOCAT is provided.

YOUCAT – Youth Catechism of the Catholic Church
* The most important contents of faith are summarized in a short and easy to understand question-answer style.
* YOUCAT was approved by the Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith in Rome and published officially by the Austrian Bishops' Conference.
* With over 5 million copies sold, YOUCAT is one of the best-selling Catholic books around the world.
* Recommended by Pope Benedict XVI.

DOCAT - Social teaching of the Catholic Church
* DOCAT is the social teaching of the Catholic Church presented in a simple and attractive way.
* The social teaching helps identify and counteract the major issues of our world. Major issues of our world are injustice, fear, hate, inequality, environmental pollution, unemployment, terror and violence. In other words, it shows you how you can change society through the power of the Gospel.
* Recommended by Pope Francis.

INSPIRATION
* Get inspired by motivating quotes of saints and testimonies from young people around the world.

CHALLENGE
* Take part in our Sunday challenge and put the Gospel into practice.

SOCIAL MEDIA
* Share your thoughts and moments with the YOUCAT Daily app on social media.
* Be encouraged by the initiatives of our community.
* See the latest posts on the integrated social media feed.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
* Your progress level is determined by the number of YOUCAT and DOCAT questions and answers you read along the way.
* Stay motivated by collecting badges and achieving streaks.

* Contact with our support directly from the app.

* YOUCAT was approved by the Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith in Rome and published officially by the Austrian Bishops' Conference.
* With over 5 million copies sold, YOUCAT is one of the best-selling Catholic books around the world.
* Recommended by Pope Benedict XVI.

DOCAT - Social teaching of the Catholic Church
* DOCAT is the social teaching of the Catholic Church presented in a simple and attractive way.
* The social teaching helps identify and counteract the major issues of our world. Major issues of our world are injustice, fear, hate, inequality, environmental pollution, unemployment, terror and violence. In other words, it shows you how you can change society through the power of the Gospel.
* Recommended by Pope Francis.

INSPIRATION
* Get inspired by motivating quotes of saints and testimonies from young people around the world.

CHALLENGE
* Take part in our Sunday challenge and put the Gospel into practice.

SOCIAL MEDIA
* Share your thoughts and moments with the YOUCAT Daily app on social media.
* Be encouraged by the initiatives of our community.
* See the latest posts on the integrated social media feed.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
* Your progress level is determined by the number of YOUCAT and DOCAT questions and answers you read along the way.
* Stay motivated by collecting badges and achieving streaks.


CONNECT WITH YOUCAT
* Contact with our support directly from the app.
* Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/youcat/
* Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/youcat
* Catch up on the latest with our newsletter: https://www.youcat.org
* Use YOUCAT Daily online: https://www.youcat.org/daily
